definition: to request recognition for sb's merits/to recommend sb for promotion or an award
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: It's a piece of cake. Why not invite the Kongfu master Wu Song to give us a hand ?
sentences.chinese: 沒事兒，咱請功夫了得的武松助我一臂之力。
